00001 #ifndef ZigguratGauss_H
00002 #define ZigguratGauss_H
00003 #include <math.h>
00004 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00005 /* Microsoft compilers don't come with stdint.h so we have to emulate it */
00006 typedef unsigned int uint32_t;
00007 #else
00008 #include <stdint.h>
00009 #endif
00010 
00025 namespace ZigguratGauss
00026 {
00027     extern const double ytab[];
00028     extern const uint32_t ktab[];
00029     extern const double wtab[];
00030     /* position of right-most step */
00031     static const double PARAM_R = 3.44428647676;
00032 
00035     template <typename GenFunctorT> 
00036     double generate(GenFunctorT & genFunctor, double sigma)
00037     {
00038         uint32_t  U, sign, i, j;
00039         double  x, y;
00040 
00041         while (1) {
00042             U = genFunctor();
00043             i = U & 0x0000007F;             /* 7 bit to choose the step */
00044             sign = U & 0x00000080;          /* 1 bit for the sign */
00045             j = U>>8;                       /* 24 bit for the x-value */
00046             x = j*wtab[i];
00047 
00048             if (j < ktab[i])  break;
00049 
00050             if (i<127) {
00051                 double  y0, y1;
00052                 y0 = ytab[i];
00053                 y1 = ytab[i+1];
00054                 y = y1+(y0-y1)*genFunctor();
00055             } else {
00056                 x = PARAM_R - log(1.0-genFunctor())/PARAM_R;
00057                 y = exp(-PARAM_R*(x-0.5*PARAM_R))*genFunctor();
00058             }
00059             if (y < exp(-0.5*x*x))  break;
00060         }
00061         return  sign ? sigma*x : -sigma*x;        
00062     }
00063 };
00064 
00065 #endif
